result.title: Codeforce security issue
result.content:
KAN mikemirzayanov

There is a really serious problem with codeforces security yesterday I reloaded the page and I went to some one else's account and it happend today again also there is another issue with solutions leaking for lots of users whats the problem?

please write in comments if you had the same problem for example you can take a look at this weird submission 32379786
